name: Everest Base Camp Trek
overview: The iconic Everest Base Camp Trek is the adventure of a lifetime, taking you through stunning Sherpa villages, across suspension bridges, and up to the base of the world's highest mountain. Experience breathtaking views of Everest, Lhotse, Nuptse, and Ama Dablam.
highlights: Stand at the base of Mount Everest (5,364m)
Panoramic Himalayan views from Kala Patthar
Visit Tengboche Monastery, the spiritual heart of the Khumbu
Experience authentic Sherpa culture and hospitality
Trek through Sagarmatha National Park (UNESCO World Heritage)
Fly into Lukla, one of the world's most scenic airports

itinerary.title: Fly to Lukla, Trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Early morning scenic flight from Kathmandu to Lukla (2,840m). Begin trekking along the Dudh Koshi river to Phakding.

itinerary.title: Phakding to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Cross suspension bridges and enter Sagarmatha National Park. Challenging uphill climb to the bustling Sherpa town of Namche Bazaar.

costIncludes: All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner) during trek
TIMS card and National Park permits
metaTitle: Everest Base Camp Trek - 14 Days Himalayan Adventure
metaDescription: Join the iconic 14-day Everest Base Camp Trek. Experience breathtaking Himalayan views, Sherpa culture, and stand at the base of the world's highest peak.

name: Annapurna Circuit Trek
overview: The Annapurna Circuit is one of the world's classic treks, circumnavigating the Annapurna Massif through diverse landscapes from subtropical forests to high-altitude deserts. Cross the challenging Thorong La Pass at 5,416m and experience incredible cultural diversity.
highlights: Cross Thorong La Pass (5,416m), one of the highest trekking passes
360Â° views of Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, and Manaslu ranges
Trek through diverse climate zones and landscapes
Experience Gurung, Thakali, and Tibetan cultures
costIncludes: Three meals a day during trek
metaTitle: Annapurna Circuit Trek - 16 Days Complete Journey
metaDescription: Experience the legendary Annapurna Circuit Trek. Cross Thorong La Pass, witness diverse landscapes, and immerse in Himalayan cultures.

name: Langtang Valley Trek
overview: The Langtang Valley Trek offers stunning mountain scenery, authentic Tamang culture, and a chance to explore the beautiful Langtang National Park. Often called the 'valley of glaciers', this trek is perfect for those seeking a shorter but equally rewarding Himalayan adventure.
highlights: Explore Kyanjin Gompa monastery and cheese factory
Trek through rhododendron and bamboo forests
Optional climb to Tserko Ri (4,984m) for panoramic views
Relatively less crowded than Everest and Annapurna
costIncludes: Kathmandu to trek starting point transport
Langtang National Park permit and TIMS
metaTitle: Langtang Valley Trek - 10 Days Himalayan Experience
metaDescription: Discover the beautiful Langtang Valley in 10 days. Experience Tamang culture, stunning mountain views, and pristine nature close to Kathmandu.
